trans:
[Group Vote] The results will be reflected in the formation of the next contest team.
ğŸ“Œ Voting Event
- Upon completing the voting mission, participants will receive the Weverse Collection badge, and 25 lucky spectators will be selected through a lottery among those who have completed the mission.
ğŸ“Œ Voting Event Precautions
1. When participating in voting, your voting history (nickname, W ID) will be provided to the SLL center for winner selection.
2. For event winners only, additional personal information (email address) will be provided to the SLL center.
- Purpose: To contact the winner of the SLL Central for personal information needed to deliver the prize (name, date of birth, nationality, contact information).
3. Event winners will be notified separately by email on November 2nd. If you do not respond to the email by noon (KST) on Monday, November 4th, you may not be able to receive the prize.
4. The personal information collected will only be used for prize delivery.
- Period of possession and use of personal information collected: Within seven days of the announcement of the winner, the applicant is within one year of the winner
